articles.title: Impeachment: Trump's lawyers open defence case
articles.description: Donald Trump's legal team has opened the President's defence case in his impeachment trial in the US Senate. He is charged with abuse of power and obstruction of Congress. The White House lawyer, Pat Cipollone, said the Democrats had failed to make their case…

articles.title: China coronavirus: Cardiff lecturer 'stranded' in Wuhan
articles.description: Yvonne Griffiths, 71, is due to fly home on Monday but does not know if the airport will be open.
articles.content:

A lecturer says she is "stranded" in China following the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: Virus casts shadow over Chinese New Year
articles.description: Growing threat interrupts holiday plans as France confirms three people there are sick with coronavirus. Also in this edition: thousands of civilians flee a fresh front in Syria’s civil war, and one of England’s top football clubs tackles racism head on.
articles.content: Growing threat interrupts holiday plans as France confirms three people there are sick with coronavirus. Also in this edition: thousands of civilians flee a fresh front in Syrias civil war, and one of Englands top football clubs tackles racism head on.
